cause.description:
This is the official University of Richmond Facebook Cause page, which will serve as a placeholder anticipating a facebook application to benefit the University directly. Watch this cause page for further information when it becomes available.
In the interim, please login to www.uronline.net to donate to the University and find fellow alumni. You may also search facebook for other alumni-created University related facebook groups.
1. We believe our mission is to sustain a collaborative learning and research community that supports the personal development of its members and the creation of new knowledge.
2. A Richmond education prepares students to live lives of purpose, thoughtful inquiry, and responsible leadership in a global and pluralistic society.
cause.mission: For our complete mission statement, please see http://president.richmond.edu/mission/index.html
